AliceMargatroid:Defend_AliceMargatroid.NAME: Defend
AliceMargatroid:Defend_AliceMargatroid.DESCRIPTION: Alice or target alicemargatroid:Doll gains !B! Block.

AliceMargatroid:Chant.NAME: Aria
AliceMargatroid:Chant.DESCRIPTION: Alice or target alicemargatroid:Doll gains !B! Block. NL All alicemargatroid:Dolls alicemargatroid:Act !M! time.

AliceMargatroid:DollPlacement.NAME: Doll Placement
AliceMargatroid:DollPlacement.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL alicemargatroid:Place a alicemargatroid:Shanghai_Doll.

AliceMargatroid:LittleLegion.NAME: Little Legion
AliceMargatroid:LittleLegion.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL alicemargatroid:Command: target alicemargatroid:Doll moves to rightmost, then alicemargatroid:Act !M! time{!M!|>1=s}.

AliceMargatroid:DollCrusader.NAME: Doll Crusader
AliceMargatroid:DollCrusader.DESCRIPTION: alicemargatroid:Recycle all alicemargatroid:Dolls, then alicemargatroid:Place a random alicemargatroid:Doll in their original slots. NL All alicemargatroid:Dolls alicemargatroid:Act once. NL Exhaust.
AliceMargatroid:DollCrusader.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: alicemargatroid:Recycle all alicemargatroid:Dolls, then alicemargatroid:Place a random alicemargatroid:Doll in their original slots. NL All alicemargatroid:Dolls alicemargatroid:Act once.

AliceMargatroid:Thread.NAME: Thread
AliceMargatroid:Thread.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If dealt unblocked damage, draw 1 card, and alicemargatroid:Place a random alicemargatroid:Doll in empty slots.

AliceMargatroid:ProtectiveSpell.NAME: Protective Spell
AliceMargatroid:ProtectiveSpell.DESCRIPTION: If Block of Alice or target alicemargatroid:Doll is below !B!, fill it up to that amount.

AliceMargatroid:Relay.NAME: Relay
AliceMargatroid:Relay.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL alicemargatroid:Command: transfer Block of all other alicemargatroid:Dolls to target alicemargatroid:Doll.
AliceMargatroid:Relay.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw 1 card. NL alicemargatroid:Command: transfer Block of all other alicemargatroid:Dolls to target alicemargatroid:Doll.

AliceMargatroid:Lantern.NAME: Lantern
AliceMargatroid:Lantern.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Choose one from the 3 cards at the bottom of your draw pile, put it into your hand. It costs 1 [E] less this turn. NL Exhaust.

AliceMargatroid:SurpriseSpring.NAME: Surprise Spring
AliceMargatroid:SurpriseSpring.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Draw !aliceM2! card, and Upgrade it this combat. NL Exhaust.
AliceMargatroid:SurpriseSpring.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Draw !aliceM2! cards, and Upgrade them this combat. NL Exhaust.

AliceMargatroid:WarFlag.NAME: War Flag
AliceMargatroid:WarFlag.DESCRIPTION: {@@}alicemargatroid:Command: target alicemargatroid:Doll alicemargatroid:Acts !M! time{!M!|>1=s}, then Alice and other alicemargatroid:Dolls gain Block equal to half of target alicemargatroid:Doll.

AliceMargatroid:DollAmbush.NAME: Doll Ambush
AliceMargatroid:DollAmbush.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Whenever a alicemargatroid:Doll is alicemargatroid:Recycled, let it alicemargatroid:act !M! time{!M!|>1=s}.

AliceMargatroid:DollWar.NAME: Dolls' War
AliceMargatroid:DollWar.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a alicemargatroid:Doll is alicemargatroid:Placed, raise its Max HP by !M!.

AliceMargatroid:DollJudge.NAME: Doll Judgement
AliceMargatroid:DollJudge.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a alicemargatroid:Doll is alicemargatroid:Recycled, Alice gains !M!% of its Block.

AliceMargatroid:Hail.NAME: Hail
AliceMargatroid:Hail.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If your hand has no duplicates (including this), draw 1 card.

AliceMargatroid:DollCremation.NAME: Doll Cremation
AliceMargatroid:DollCremation.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL alicemargatroid:Recycle your rightmost alicemargatroid:Doll (if any).

AliceMargatroid:SevenColoredPuppeteer.NAME: 7-colored Puppeteer
AliceMargatroid:SevenColoredPuppeteer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times. NL Only playable if some kind of alicemargatroid:Doll has alicemargatroid:Act 7 times; NL Costs 1 [E] less for each different kind of alicemargatroid:Doll alicemargatroid:Placed.
AliceMargatroid:SevenColoredPuppeteer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times. NL Only playable if some kind of alicemargatroid:Doll has alicemargatroid:Act 7 times; NL Costs 1 [E] less for each different kind of alicemargatroid:Doll alicemargatroid:Placed.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Only playable if some kind of Doll has Act #r7 times!

AliceMargatroid:Collector.NAME: Collector
AliceMargatroid:Collector.DESCRIPTION: For each different kind of alicemargatroid:Doll you have, Alice or target alicemargatroid:Doll gains !M! Block.

AliceMargatroid:MaliceSpark.NAME: Malice Spark
AliceMargatroid:MaliceSpark.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Reduce your max hand size by !aliceM2! this turn. NL Draw !M! cards.

AliceMargatroid:CallToDolls.NAME: Call to Dolls
AliceMargatroid:CallToDolls.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL In !M! turns, target receives 50% more damage from alicemargatroid:Dolls.

AliceMargatroid:SnowSweeping.NAME: Snow Sweeping
AliceMargatroid:SnowSweeping.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Alice or target alicemargatroid:Doll gains !B! Block. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL alicemargatroid:Command: target alicemargatroid:Doll alicemargatroid:Acts once.

AliceMargatroid:FriendsHelp.NAME: Friend's Help
AliceMargatroid:FriendsHelp.DESCRIPTION: Choose one from *Double *Spark, *Asteroid *Belt or *6A, add it into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
AliceMargatroid:FriendsHelp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose one from *Double *Spark+, *Asteroid *Belt+ or *6A+, add it into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Pay extra energy for its effect when you have enough [E].

AliceMargatroid:ReturningDolls.NAME: Returning Dolls
AliceMargatroid:ReturningDolls.DESCRIPTION: alicemargatroid:Command: alicemargatroid:Recycle target alicemargatroid:Doll, draw !M! cards, then add a *Retrace into your hand.
AliceMargatroid:ReturningDolls.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: alicemargatroid:Command: alicemargatroid:Recycle target alicemargatroid:Doll, draw !M! cards, then add a *Retrace+ into your hand.

AliceMargatroid:SPDoll.NAME: SP Doll
AliceMargatroid:SPDoll.DESCRIPTION: Randomly alicemargatroid:Place a alicemargatroid:Shanghai_Doll or alicemargatroid:Kyoto_Doll in at most !M! random empty slots, respectively.

AliceMargatroid:DollLances.NAME: Doll Lances
AliceMargatroid:DollLances.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL All alicemargatroid:Shanghai_Dolls alicemargatroid:Act !M! time{!M!|>1=s}, prioritizing to attack the target.
AliceMargatroid:DollLances.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL All alicemargatroid:Shanghai_Dolls alicemargatroid:Act !M! time{!M!|>1=s}, prioritizing to attack the target, but only deal half damage the second time.

AliceMargatroid:Ultimatum.NAME: Ultimatum
AliceMargatroid:Ultimatum.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable. NL Also works on other enemies with the same name. NL Exhaust.

AliceMargatroid:BlackTea.NAME: Black Tea
AliceMargatroid:BlackTea.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Retain. NL When drawn or at the start or your turn, gain [E] . NL Exhaust after !M! times.

AliceMargatroid:Barrier.NAME: Barrier
AliceMargatroid:Barrier.DESCRIPTION: Alice or target alicemargatroid:Doll gains !B! Block. NL Place a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.
AliceMargatroid:Barrier.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Alice or target alicemargatroid:Doll gains !B! Block. NL Place a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile. NL Discarded after played !stslib:persist! (instead of 1) times.

AliceMargatroid:DollOfRoundTable.NAME: Doll of Round Table
AliceMargatroid:DollOfRoundTable.DESCRIPTION: Alice and all alicemargatroid:Dolls gain !B! Block. NL You cannot gain Block from cards this turn. NL Exhaust.

AliceMargatroid:Dessert.NAME: Dessert
AliceMargatroid:Dessert.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]. NL Automatically played after playing the leftmost or rightmost card in hand.
AliceMargatroid:Dessert.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL Automatically played after playing the leftmost or rightmost card in hand.

AliceMargatroid:TheSetup.NAME: The Setup
AliceMargatroid:TheSetup.DESCRIPTION: All alicemargatroid:Dolls about to be attacked alicemargatroid:Act once. NL alicemargatroid:Shanghai_Dolls and alicemargatroid:Kyoto_Dolls will also gain Block equal to damage dealt.
AliceMargatroid:TheSetup.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: All alicemargatroid:Dolls with an enemy against its slot alicemargatroid:Act once. NL alicemargatroid:Shanghai_Dolls and alicemargatroid:Kyoto_Dolls will also gain Block equal to damage dealt.

AliceMargatroid:Sale.NAME: Sale
AliceMargatroid:Sale.DESCRIPTION: alicemargatroid:Command: alicemargatroid:Recycle target alicemargatroid:Doll, gain !M! Gold. NL Exhaust.

AliceMargatroid:DollActivation.NAME: Doll Activation
AliceMargatroid:DollActivation.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, your rightmost alicemargatroid:Doll alicemargatroid:Acts once.
AliceMargatroid:DollActivation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, your rightmost !M! alicemargatroid:Dolls each alicemargatroid:Act once.

AliceMargatroid:AliceInWonderland.NAME: Alice in Wonderland
AliceMargatroid:AliceInWonderland.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Exhaust all cards in hand, add equal number of random cards into your hand. NL They cost 1 [E] less this combat.
AliceMargatroid:AliceInWonderland.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Exhaust all cards in hand, add equal of random Upgraded cards into your hand. NL They cost 1 [E] less this combat.
AliceMargatroid:AliceInWonderland.FLAVOR: "Why is a raven like a writing-desk?"

AliceMargatroid:Pause.NAME: Pause
AliceMargatroid:Pause.DESCRIPTION: Alice or target alicemargatroid:Doll gains !B! Block. NL Next turn, draw !M! additional cards.

AliceMargatroid:Revelation.NAME: Revelation
AliceMargatroid:Revelation.DESCRIPTION: Let a random Attack in your hand gain !M! bonus base damage, and gain alicemargatroid:Revelation effect. NL Exhaust.
AliceMargatroid:Revelation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Let all Attacks in your hand gain !M! bonus base damage, and gain alicemargatroid:Revelation+ effect. NL Exhaust.

AliceMargatroid:CollapsingWorlds.NAME: Collapsing Worlds!
AliceMargatroid:CollapsingWorlds.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills the target, gain an extra turn after this one, and then Exhaust.

AliceMargatroid:Housework.NAME: Housework
AliceMargatroid:Housework.DESCRIPTION: alicemargatroid:Dolls in target slot and adjacent slots alicemargatroid:Act once respectively.

AliceMargatroid:Bookmark.NAME: Bookmark
AliceMargatroid:Bookmark.DESCRIPTION: Return all cards in your hand at the start of last turn (except *Bookmark) from draw, discard or Exhaust pile to your hand. NL Exhaust.

AliceMargatroid:MaidensBunraku.NAME: Maiden's Bunraku
AliceMargatroid:MaidensBunraku.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Whenever a alicemargatroid:Doll alicemargatroid:Acts, it gains !M! Block.

AliceMargatroid:Usokae.NAME: Usokae
AliceMargatroid:Usokae.DESCRIPTION: For each enemy, if there is a alicemargatroid:Doll in the corresponding slot, negate all debuffs from that enemy.
AliceMargatroid:Usokae.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL For each enemy, if there is a alicemargatroid:Doll in the corresponding slot, negate all debuffs from that enemy.

AliceMargatroid:Tripwire.NAME: Tripwire
AliceMargatroid:Tripwire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each empty doll slot.

AliceMargatroid:DevilryLight.NAME: Devilry Light
AliceMargatroid:DevilryLight.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL At the start of next turn, apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

AliceMargatroid:RefreshingSpringWater.NAME: Refreshing Spring Water
AliceMargatroid:RefreshingSpringWater.DESCRIPTION: If you have at least 5 alicemargatroid:Dolls, gain [E] , draw 1 card.
AliceMargatroid:RefreshingSpringWater.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you have at least 5 alicemargatroid:Dolls, gain [E] [E] , draw 1 card.

AliceMargatroid:DollArmy.NAME: Doll Army
AliceMargatroid:DollArmy.DESCRIPTION: alicemargatroid:Command: alicemargatroid:Place a copy of target alicemargatroid:Doll in each of at most !M! empty slots. NL Exhaust.

AliceMargatroid:AliceGame.NAME: Alice Game
AliceMargatroid:AliceGame.DESCRIPTION: Retain. alicemargatroid:Command: alicemargatroid:Recycle all alicemargatroid:Dolls except target alicemargatroid:doll, then target alicemargatroid:Doll alicemargatroid:Acts once. NL For each alicemargatroid:Doll alicemargatroid:Recycled this time, it alicemargatroid:Acts additionally 1 time. NL Exhaust.
AliceMargatroid:AliceGame.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. alicemargatroid:Command: alicemargatroid:Recycle all alicemargatroid:Dolls except target alicemargatroid:doll, then target alicemargatroid:Doll alicemargatroid:Acts once. NL For each alicemargatroid:Doll alicemargatroid:Recycled this time, it alicemargatroid:Acts additionally 1 time.

AliceMargatroid:SeekerDoll.NAME: Seeker Doll
AliceMargatroid:SeekerDoll.DESCRIPTION: alicemargatroid:Command: target alicemargatroid:Doll alicemargatroid:Acts !aliceM2! times. NL If this is the first time *Seeker *Doll is played this turn, it alicemargatroid:Acts additionally 1 time.

AliceMargatroid:ArtfulChanter_V2.NAME: Artful Chanter
AliceMargatroid:ArtfulChanter_V2.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a alicemargatroid:Doll is alicemargatroid:Placed, if that kind of alicemargatroid:Doll has been alicemargatroid:Recycled or destroyed this combat, let it alicemargatroid:Act once.

AliceMargatroid:Masterpiece.NAME: Masterpiece
AliceMargatroid:Masterpiece.DESCRIPTION: alicemargatroid:Command: alicemargatroid:Recycle target alicemargatroid:Doll, Alice gains Block equal to its HP +!B!, and draws 1 card.

AliceMargatroid:MagicianRay.NAME: Magician Ray
AliceMargatroid:MagicianRay.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Strength until the end of your next turn.

AliceMargatroid:LuminousShanghaiDoll.NAME: Luminous Shanghai Doll
AliceMargatroid:LuminousShanghaiDoll.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a non- alicemargatroid:Shanghai_Doll alicemargatroid:Acts, let a random alicemargatroid:Shanghai_Doll alicemargatroid:Act once.

AliceMargatroid:TheSouthernCross.NAME: The Southern Cross
AliceMargatroid:TheSouthernCross.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Put !M! random Attack{!M!|>1=s} with non-zero cost into your hand, and Upgrade {!M!|1=it|@=them} this combat.

AliceMargatroid:Perihelion.NAME: Perihelion
AliceMargatroid:Perihelion.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If the *Attributes of this card are changed this combat, deal triple damage instead.

AliceMargatroid:IllusoryMoon.NAME: Illusory Moon
AliceMargatroid:IllusoryMoon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !aliceD2! damage. NL Then deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times.

AliceMargatroid:SeaOfSubconsciousness.NAME: Sea of Subconscious
AliceMargatroid:SeaOfSubconsciousness.DESCRIPTION: After playing a card in hand, if there is a alicemargatroid:Doll with the same order as the card, it alicemargatroid:Acts once.
AliceMargatroid:SeaOfSubconsciousness.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL After playing a card in hand, if there is a alicemargatroid:Doll with the same order as the card, it alicemargatroid:Acts once.

AliceMargatroid:ReturnInanimateness.NAME: Return Inanimateness
AliceMargatroid:ReturnInanimateness.DESCRIPTION: alicemargatroid:Recycle all alicemargatroid:Dolls, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Double base damage for each different kind of alicemargatroid:Doll you have.

AliceMargatroid:SpectreMystery.NAME: Spectre Mystery
AliceMargatroid:SpectreMystery.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade the topmost !M! cards in your draw pile this combat.

AliceMargatroid:DollInSea.NAME: Doll In Sea
AliceMargatroid:DollInSea.DESCRIPTION: All alicemargatroid:Dolls heal half of their Max HP. NL Raise the Max HP of all alicemargatroid:Shanghai_Dolls and alicemargatroid:Kyoto_Dolls by !M!.
AliceMargatroid:DollInSea.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: All alicemargatroid:Dolls heal all of their HP. NL Raise the Max HP of all alicemargatroid:Shanghai_Dolls and alicemargatroid:Kyoto_Dolls by !M!.

AliceMargatroid:ClawMachine.NAME: Claw Machine
AliceMargatroid:ClawMachine.DESCRIPTION: Randomly alicemargatroid:Place a %s, each kind once per combat. NL If there is no remaining choice, Exhaust.
AliceMargatroid:ClawMachine.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose to alicemargatroid:Place a %s, each kind once per combat. NL If there is no remaining choice, Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Oops! There is no remaining choice. NL Maybe you should report to the author.

AliceMargatroid:PrincessForm.NAME: Princess Form
AliceMargatroid:PrincessForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL For every 3 1-cost cards played, add a 0-cost copy of the 3rd one with alicemargatroid:Phantom to your hand.
AliceMargatroid:PrincessForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: For every 3 1-cost cards played, add a 0-cost copy of the 3rd one with alicemargatroid:Phantom to your hand.

AliceMargatroid:PolarNight.NAME: Polar Night
AliceMargatroid:PolarNight.DESCRIPTION: Restore [E] to max. NL Draw cards equal to restored [E]. NL Exhaust.

AliceMargatroid:FuturisticBunraku.NAME: Futuristic Bunraku
AliceMargatroid:FuturisticBunraku.DESCRIPTION: alicemargatroid:Command: This turn, whenever you play a card, target alicemargatroid:Doll alicemargatroid:Acts once; At the end of this turn, alicemargatroid:Recycle it. NL Exhaust.

AliceMargatroid:StrawDollKamikaze.NAME: Straw Doll Kamikaze
AliceMargatroid:StrawDollKamikaze.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! alicemargatroid:Blur. NL Add a *Retrace into your hand. NL ( alicemargatroid:Blur will also work on alicemargatroid:Dolls. )

AliceMargatroid:ForbiddenMagic.NAME: Forbidden Magic
AliceMargatroid:ForbiddenMagic.DESCRIPTION: {@@}This turn, cards which can be played on alicemargatroid:Dolls gain " alicemargatroid:Command: target alicemargatroid:Doll alicemargatroid:Acts !M! time{!M!|>1=s}, then Exhaust. " effect.

AliceMargatroid:SemiAutomaton.NAME: Semi-Automaton
AliceMargatroid:SemiAutomaton.DESCRIPTION: After you alicemargatroid:Place next alicemargatroid:Doll, let it alicemargatroid:Act !M! times. NL Exhaust.

AliceMargatroid:Geyser.NAME: Geyser
AliceMargatroid:Geyser.DESCRIPTION: Increase Block gained from cards by !M!%.

AliceMargatroid:SoldierOfCross.NAME: Soldier of Cross
AliceMargatroid:SoldierOfCross.DESCRIPTION: Alice or target alicemargatroid:Doll gains !B! Block. NL alicemargatroid:Command: *Taunt ALL enemies for !M! turn. *Taunted enemies can only attack the target slot.

AliceMargatroid:UnlockMystic.NAME: Unlock Mystic
AliceMargatroid:UnlockMystic.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you trigger alicemargatroid:Command, gain [E] , and draw 1 card. NL Each unique name of cards can only trigger this once. NL Not stackable, instead reset triggered names.

AliceMargatroid:SuicideSquad.NAME: Suicide Squad
AliceMargatroid:SuicideSquad.DESCRIPTION: alicemargatroid:Command: Deal !D! damage to corresponding enemy of target alicemargatroid:Doll; target alicemargatroid:Doll gains !B! Block, heal !M! HP, increase its Max HP by !M!.

AliceMargatroid:DollArrangement.NAME: Doll Arrangement
AliceMargatroid:DollArrangement.DESCRIPTION: alicemargatroid:Place a alicemargatroid:Doll you do not have at random. NL Repeat this in empty slots, until you have at least !M! alicemargatroid:Dolls. NL All alicemargatroid:Dolls gain !B! Block.
AliceMargatroid:DollArrangement.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: alicemargatroid:Place a alicemargatroid:Doll you do not have at random. NL Repeat this in empty slots, until you have at least !M! alicemargatroid:Dolls. NL Alice and all alicemargatroid:Dolls gain !B! Block.

AliceMargatroid:VivaciousShanghaiDoll.NAME: Vivacious Shanghai Doll
AliceMargatroid:VivaciousShanghaiDoll.DESCRIPTION: alicemargatroid:Place a alicemargatroid:Shanghai_Doll. NL Let it alicemargatroid:Act !M! times.

AliceMargatroid:QuietHouraiDoll.NAME: Quiet Hourai Doll
AliceMargatroid:QuietHouraiDoll.DESCRIPTION: alicemargatroid:Place a alicemargatroid:Hourai_Doll. NL Next turn, draw 1 additional card.
AliceMargatroid:QuietHouraiDoll.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: alicemargatroid:Place a alicemargatroid:Hourai_Doll. NL Let it alicemargatroid:Act once. NL Next turn, draw 1 additional card.

AliceMargatroid:CharitableFranceDoll.NAME: Fraternal French Doll
AliceMargatroid:CharitableFranceDoll.DESCRIPTION: alicemargatroid:Place a alicemargatroid:French_Doll. NL Apply !M! Weak to the corresponding enemy of target slot.

AliceMargatroid:Retrace.NAME: Retrace
AliceMargatroid:Retrace.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL alicemargatroid:Command: alicemargatroid:Recycle target alicemargatroid:Doll, draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

AliceMargatroid:CreateSusan.NAME: Su-san
AliceMargatroid:CreateSusan.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL alicemargatroid:Place alicemargatroid:Su-san. NL Exhaust.

AliceMargatroid:CreateDoll.NAME: Clawing
AliceMargatroid:CreateDoll.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: alicemargatroid:Place a %s in the !M! th slot from left to right.

AliceMargatroid:PoisonousSweet.NAME: Poisonous Sweet
AliceMargatroid:PoisonousSweet.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, gain !M! Poison.

AliceMargatroid:AliceDoubleSpark.NAME: Double Spark
AliceMargatroid:AliceDoubleSpark.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 1 *Spark to your hand.
AliceMargatroid:AliceDoubleSpark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 1 Upgraded *Spark to your hand.

AliceMargatroid:AliceAsteroidBelt.NAME: Asteroid Belt
AliceMargatroid:AliceAsteroidBelt.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL alicemargatroid:Amplify [E] : Next turn, gain !B! Block.

AliceMargatroid:Alice6A.NAME: 6A
AliceMargatroid:Alice6A.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain Block equal to the unblocked damage dealt.
